summary: This document is a letter from Jeffrey Epstein authorizing the transfer of his personal savings account to Deutsche Bank. The letter includes specific instructions for the transfer but does not provide detailed context regarding the purpose of the transfer.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual authorizing the transfer of his personal savings account to Deutsche Bank.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein authorized the transfer of his personal savings account.
The transfer is directed to Deutsche Bank.
The document is marked as confidential.
